alert.note: Alert for Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 09 at 10:04PM PST until January 11 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, and around 1 to 3 inches along Interstate 5 on the Grapevine. Winds gusting around 45 mph, but as high as 60 mph in the highest elevations. * WHERE...Kern River Valley, Piute Walker Basin, Tehachapi, Grapevine and Frazier Mountain Communities Counties. * WHEN...From 4 PM Wednesday to 10 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible with slick and snow-covered roads. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage in some areas. Cold wind chills as low as 20 below zero are possible in the highest elevations that could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Frazier Mountain Communities; Grapevine; Kern River Valley; Piute Walker Basin; Tehachapi
